haberman.rhizomatics.ui.anim

Class ResizeAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • haberman.rhizomatics.ui.anim.ResizeAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ResizeAnimation
extends android.view.animation.Animation
    2 states animator that will enlarge or shrink a given view on a specified axis.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ResizeAnimation.Axis
      Enum the possible transformation's axis.
      static class  ResizeAnimation.State
      Enum the possible animations' states.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.view.animation.Animation

        android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener, android.view.animation.Animation.Description

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private float from_
      Start / end values of the animation, regardless of the state.

      Reference to the view that receives transformations.
